result.title: Engineering Manager
result.description:
Position Description
- Collaborate & coordinate with multiple teams for shipping new product features.
- Work on hiring initiatives to recruit engineering talent.。
- Responsible for the team project priorities, deadlines, and deliverables.
- Define long term technical roadmaps and contribute to technical decisions on the team.

Job Requirements
- Bachelor's degree or above, majoring in Computer Science or related fields，proficient in C++ & Java.
- Strong Computer Science fundamentals (computer architectures, algorithms, data structures, software design) and problem-solving skills.
- 2+ years of experience in managing or technically leading a software engineering team.
- Excellent teamwork skills, communication skills, and project management skills.
